problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
v_m="x*sqrt((2*k)/(3*m))"
problem.p: A system consists of two blocks, of masses \(m\) and \(2m\), attached to the ends of a spring with a force constant \(k\). The system is placed on a horizontal frictionless surface. Initially, the spring is relaxed. The blocks are then slowly pulled apart an extra distance \(x\) and released.What is the maximum speed \(v_m\) of the block of mass \(m\) during the subsequent motion of the blocks?
